summary.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel value of the color.

span.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel value of the color.

value.span: Alpha 色頻值的色彩，這是介於 0 到 255 之間的值。

span.span: The alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 色板結構決定的透明度有。The alpha channel of a structure determines the amount of transparency the has. Alpha 值為 255 表示完全不透明，值為 0 表示色彩是完全透明的。An alpha value of 255 indicates the is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent. `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 和 ScRGB 色頻 (， ， ， ) 的結構會同步處理屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the ScRGB channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，則`sRGB`alpha 色板，已經過修改， `ScRGB` alpha 色頻，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值的範圍，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構會加在一起，方法是加入第二個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻的第一個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻。 structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color. 比方說，alpha 色板`color1`的 alpha 色板和`color2`新增一起，以產生結果色彩的 alpha 色板。For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color. 一樣是使用產生的新色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻的紅色、 綠色和藍色的通道。The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 及`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，則`sRGB`藍色通道、 已經過修改，`ScRGB`藍色色頻，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值的範圍，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的`ScRGB`色彩空間大於限制範圍，所以使用這個方法可能會導致遺失色彩資訊。The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.

summary.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.

value.span: [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 之色彩的色彩設定檔。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]色彩設定檔包含特定應用程式或裝置，例如彩色印表機的色彩系統設定檔。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer. 此設定檔會對應至常見的設定檔接著可以對應至個別的設定檔的其他裝置。This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices. 這可讓一部電腦的裝置用來比對從其他應用程式和裝置上相同或其他電腦的系統色彩的色彩系統。This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.

summary.span: Tests whether the specified object is a structure and is equivalent to this color.

span.span: Tests whether the specified object is a structure and is equivalent to this color.

returns.span: if the specified object is a structure and is identical to the current structure; otherwise, .

span.span: if the specified object is a structure and is identical to the current structure; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浮點值可以取得較小的程度的錯誤，當它們對。Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon. 方法中，運算子，而運算子無法補救此不，並因此可能不會傳回預期的布林值結果。The method, the operator, and the operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result. 方法會使用此浮點算術錯誤補償，藉由傳回的模糊的等號比較演算法`true`如需比較兩個結構幾乎完全相同，但其值可能不同minuscule 數量。The method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.

Alpha 值為 255 表示色彩是完全不透明，值為 0 表示色彩是完全透明的。An alpha value of 255 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent. ## Examples [!code-csharp[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromArgbExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CreateColorsFromExample.cs#fromargbexample)] [!code-vb[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromArgbExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/createcolorsfromexample.vb#fromargbexample)]

Alpha 值為 1 表示色彩是完全不透明，，和值為 0 表示色彩是完全透明的。An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent. SRGB 通道 (， ， ， ) 和 ScRGB 色頻 (， ， ， ) 的結構會同步處理內容。The sRGB channels (, , , ) and the ScRGB channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，修改的 ScRGB 紅色色頻的 sRGB 紅色色頻，轉換為相等的值。For example, when , the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, , is transformed to the equivalent value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立結構。The following example shows how to use the method to create a structure. remarks.format: ## Remarks A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]色彩設定檔包含特定應用程式或裝置，例如彩色印表機的色彩系統設定檔。A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer. 此設定檔會對應至常見的設定檔接著可以對應至個別的設定檔的其他裝置。This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices. 這可讓一部電腦的裝置用來比對從其他應用程式和裝置上相同或其他電腦的系統色彩的色彩系統。This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立結構。The following example shows how to use the method to create a structure. [!code-csharp[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromValuesExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CreateColorsFromExample.cs#fromvaluesexample)] [!code-vb[BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#FromValuesExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/createcolorsfromexample.vb#fromvaluesexample)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 及`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，則`sRGB`綠色通道、 已經過修改，`ScRGB`綠色色頻，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值的範圍，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構會加在一起，方法是加入第二個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻的第一個色彩的 alpha、 紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻。 structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color. 比方說，alpha 色板`color1`的 alpha 色板和`color2`新增一起，以產生結果色彩的 alpha 色板。For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color. 一樣是使用產生的新色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色色頻的紅色、 綠色和藍色的通道。The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浮點值可以取得較小的程度的錯誤，當它們對。Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon. 方法中，運算子，而運算子無法補救此不，並因此可能不會傳回預期的布林值結果。The method, the operator, and the operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result. 方法會使用此浮點算術錯誤補償，藉由傳回的模糊的等號比較演算法`true`如需比較兩個結構幾乎完全相同，但其值可能不同minuscule 數量。The method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount. 這個運算子的對等方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 及`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，則`sRGB`紅色色頻，已經過修改，`ScRGB`紅色色頻，轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值的範圍，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, , is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.

summary.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel value of the color.

value.span: Alpha 色頻值結構，介於 0 和 1 之間的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 色板結構決定的透明度有。The alpha channel of a structure determines the amount of transparency the has. Alpha 值為 1 表示完全不透明，值為 0 表示色彩是完全透明的。An alpha value of 1 indicates the is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent. `sRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 及`ScRGB`通道 (， ， ， ) 的結構同步處理的屬性。The `sRGB` channels (, , , ) and the `ScRGB` channels (, , , ) of the structure are synchronized properties. 例如，當，則`sRGB`alpha 色板，已經過修改， `ScRGB` alpha 色頻轉換為對等項目使用 0-1 的值的範圍，`Sc`配置支援。For example, when , the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
